en.title: FusionExcel Donates RM 21,000 to "A Piece Of Hope - Chapter 3" Charity.
en.content:
FE is proud to donate RM 21,000 to "A Piece Of Hope - Chapter 3" Charity at a press conference held at FE's HQ on Wednesday, 01st July 2009. A mockup cheque of RM 10,000 was handed by FE's Founder CEO Paul Ting and Founder Director KS Lee to Augustine Benedict (Chairman) and Ms Kong Lan Lee (Director) of Persatuan Kanak Kanak Istimewa Kajang Selangor (PKIK). Another mockup cheque of RM 11,000 comprising of products was handed to Sunny Ting Ted Sun (Chairman of A Piece of Hope) and Jimmy Lim, Director of Malton Bhd, representing a group of mountain trekkers.

In July, the group of mountain trekkers, led by Jimmy Lim will trek up Mountain Kinabalu in Sabah to raise funds for PKIK, an NGO that offers learning / training programs for children with intellectual disabilities to help them in their overall development and help them towards a life as independent and as meaningful as possible.

Each of the trekkers will carry a piece of jigsaw puzzle and trek to the top of Mountain Kinabalu. Once at the top, the pieces of jigsaw puzzle will be assembled into a complete picture. Each piece of the jigsaw puzzle symbolizes ONE Hope for a child. But once the pieces are assembled as a picture it symbolizes HOPE for a future generation.

This is the 3rd fund raising campaign, Chapter 3, for "A Piece of Hope". The 1st campaign in 2007 raised RM 125,000 for Shelter Homes, an NGO that cares for Child Abuse Children. Last year, 2008, a total of RM 135,000 was raised for the Handicapped Homes in Taman Megah.
